title: Shawl
medium:
Medium: wool
Technique: 2/2 twill tapestry (field); 2/2 twill double interlocked tapestry (inner border); 2/2 twill tapestry patches embroidered mainly in stem stitch (outer border)
dimensions: H x W: 160 x 160 cm (5 ft. 3 in. x 5 ft. 3 in.)
description: Square shawl with a black center on a field made to be folded on a diagonal and worn as a triangle. Inner border of Kashmir woven strips. Outer fringed border is patchwork and embroidery of decent quality.

tombstone.epitaph:
Shawl.Medium: wool
Technique: 2/2 twill tapestry (field); 2/2 twill double interlocked tapestry (inner border); 2/2 twill tapestry patches embroidered mainly in stem stitch (outer border). 1967-32-2.
